meanings.definition: To mention or describe in detail
meanings.sent1: Please specify the color of the car you want to buy.
meanings.sent2: Can you specify the time you would like to meet?
meanings.sent3: I can't specify which flavor of ice cream I want because they all look delicious!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a map, clearly specifying the path to follow.
meanings.sent5: The recipe must specify the exact measurements for the cake to turn out perfectly.

meanings.definition: To state explicitly or in detail
meanings.sent1: He needs to specify the rules of the game before we start playing.
meanings.sent2: Could you specify the requirements for the project?
meanings.sent3: The teacher specified that the homework should be done by tomorrow.
meanings.sent4: His speech specified the importance of kindness in our daily lives.
meanings.sent5: The contract should specify the responsibilities of each party involved.

meanings.sent1: The witness must specify the suspect in the police lineup.
meanings.sent2: It is important to specify the exact location of the meeting.
meanings.sent3: She tried to specify the type of bird she saw, but it flew away too quickly.
meanings.sent4: The map clearly specifies the boundaries of the national park.
meanings.sent5: To avoid confusion, please specify your preferred mode of transportation.
